column4: is there anyone else out there having problem with ndiswrapper and teh newer kernels diabling the device irq on boot?
is there anyone else out there having problem with ndiswrapper and the newer kernels disabling the device irq on boot?
no but personally, I wouldn't use any card that requires ndiswrapper. Find a card with an atheros chipset
not much of a choice, came with the notebook
